CustomField.description: US-4157 - field is required to detail the type of license category that a user has. This field is used in the My Access integration to exclude users from being deactivated if they never log in.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The manner in which the user utilises the Salesforce license. Currently used as an exception for users that are not required to login but still require a license.
CustomField.label: License Category
